question: Computers are often argued to be the most important invention of the last hundred years. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
text: The Computers are relatively a new device due to a little ambiguous, therefore many people still debate the importance of developing. Thus, I think the invention of computers was essential in the last century.

In spite of the society cannot decline the fact that in the last century the world had many other inventions such as discovering new vaccine or a car that is friendlier to the environment. Therefore, some people think about such side as more important because of a tendency modifying the sickness and grow the level of pollution these contraptions seem more effective and provide more benefits. Moreover, computers all the time are modifying because had many problems with details or the software while other discoveries had an immediate effect on people's life.
